casebody.data:
HOLCOMBE, et al.
v.
OAK ISLAND AIRCRAFT HOUSING, LLC, et al. 170P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2018 Christopher A. Chleborowicz, Elijah A.T. Huston, Attorneys at Law, for 717, NC, LLC, et al.

G. Grady Richardson, Jr., Attorney at Law, For Holcombe, Claudia, et al.

Randolph M. James, Attorney at Law, For Stephenson, Kevin W.

Charles D. Meier, Kimberly L. Moore, Attorneys at Law, For Martin, Robert, et al.

Dawn Walton, for State. Benedict J. Del Re, Jr., Attorney at Law, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of June 2018 by Defendant (Kevin W. Stephenson) to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
